Machine Learning with

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plyr)
library(datasets)
data("iris")

wholedf <- iris
dim(wholedf)
```


```{r}
str(wholedf)
```

```{r}
colSums(sapply(wholedf, is.na))
```

```{r}
ggplot(wholedf, aes(x=log(Sepal.Width+1))) + geom_histogram(col = 'white') + theme_light()
```
